item.title: Manual vs. Automated Software Testing: Choosing the Right Strategy

item.title: DevSecOps: Tackling Challenges, Seizing Opportunities.
item.dc:creator: SimeonOnSecurity
item.category: "DevSecOps" , "information security" , "security testing" , "agile methodologies" , "collaboration" , "government regulations" , "automation" , "application development" , "scalability" , "continuous monitoring" , "NIST guidelines" , "feedback loops" , "modularity" , "vulnerabilities" , "quality assurance" , "cybersecurity" , "IT infrastructure" , "software development tools" , "risk management"
item.description: This article explores the challenges and opportunities of DevSecOps in organizations, including better collaboration, improved scalability, integration with government regulations, and more.
